pullRequest.title: 1.16 mixin fix for nether biomes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Apparently the method changed a bit since the biome list was a local parameter instead of a fixed variable in the method
I also added a testmod just in case

commit.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Joseph Burton <burtonjae@hotmail.co.uk>

nodes.bodyText: This could almost jsut be an inner class in FabricBiomeTest
nodes.diffHunk:
